name: Space Rescue (mooglerain)
description:
Try to save as many ship as possible without getting destroyed by the asteroids. Watch out though, you have to CONNECT the ship to the right ship bay or they're gonna crash. You can rotate the station with "A" and "D" and shoot up asteroids (or ship) with the right click of the mouse.

Triangle ship goes with Triangle bay/W-shaped ship goes with W-shaped bay/ Square-head-shaped ship goes with Square-shaped bay.

You can also buy upgrades from, the shop with money made during the game.

point system:
-Each 3 seconds you get 2 score and 2 money.
-Destroying an asteroid gets you 2 score and 2 money.
-Fully save a ship gets you 1 hp, 4 score and 4 money.

This game was made for a friendly game jam.
